Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claws, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 12 Slashing and can inflict a fiendish wound
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Greataxe, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 20/60ft, Average Damage: 18 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Nycaloth makes 2 melee attacks, or it makes one melee attack and teleports
Other Actions.Action 2: Teleport, The Nycaloth magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see

Abilities.Ability 1: Innate Spellcasting, The Nycaloth can innately cast a few spells
Abilities.Ability 2: Magic Resistance, The Nycaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 3: Magic Weapons, The Nycaloth's weapons attacks are magical

Damage Resistances.Damage 4: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks
